summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6703 for the improvement of Lakewood Avenue South from South Court Street to Cascadia Avenue South; certain other streets, avenues and an alley, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 107436 to include a portion of a parcel of land which is created by short plat within the boundaries of said district; to revise the maximum interest payable on local improvement bonds.
